mapper.sql: id, name, url, description, resource_type, icon, pid, seq, create_time, status
mapper.insert: insert into resource (id, name, url, description, resource_type, icon, pid, seq, create_time, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seq,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update:
update resource
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resource_type = #{resourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
seq = #{seq,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
